channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Samsung Accidentally Leaks Galaxy S24 FE Release Date, Price And Features
item.description: Samsung is ramping up prices for its latest phone.

item.title: Northern Lights Forecast: Solar Storm May Make Aurora Borealis Visible In These States
item.description: The lights may be visible in Washington, Idaho, Montana, North Dakota, South Dakota, Minnesota, Wisconsin, Michigan and Maine.
